summary: Polish the app for judging: add motivational quote on home, enable users to enter circles, fix conversation-start error in connections, and seed global chat with existing thoughts/experiences to avoid 'first post' messaging.
known_issues: Error occurs when starting a conversation from Connections

existing_features.title: Add a motivational quote section at the end of the Home page (after the existing "Your Journey Continues" section). The quote must be in English and render consistently without affecting existing layout.

Enable users to enter a circle from the Circles page by making each circleâ€™s primary action navigate to an in-app circle view (e.g., a circle detail screen) rather than a no-op button. The circle view must be accessible via UI and must not require backend changes.

Fix the Connections -> Start Chat flow so pressing "Start Chat" never triggers a runtime error. Handle invalid/placeholder partner identifiers safely by preventing crashes in ChatPage and/or ensuring navigation only uses valid partner values.

Seed the Global Chat feed with multiple initial thoughts/experiences so the feed is not empty on a fresh/empty state, and update the empty-state copy to avoid any phrasing implying the user is the first to post (in particular remove "Be the first to share"). All user-facing text must be in English.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show a motivational quote at the end of the home screen
Allow users to enter/join a circle (enable access into the circle)
Seed global chat with initial thoughts/experiences and remove 'you are the first one to share' messaging
Fix error shown when pressing 'Start a conversation' in Connections

projectName: Polish judging flow: home quote, circles entry, fix connections chat error, and seed global chat
